page.title: 11YOUNG PEOPLE cont
page.content: travel quite a long way to find work,if they could find a job at all. Most of the under 15's said that they liked the area and enjoy living here.They generally expressed great aversion to the idea of living in a town.However,most of those over 16 said that they wanted to move away from the area as soon as possible because of the lack of things to do, the remoteness and the poor employment prospects.A view often expressed was that this area is one that people of retirement age might like to live in but that there is nothing here for the young.
